column2: A member or relative of the Salazar family, owners and founders of Salazar Shipping, a leading power-broker in the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Salazar
A member or relative of the Weyland family, owners and founders of the Weyland Corporation, a leading power-broker in the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Weyland
A member or relative of the Afolayan family, owners and founders of the Afolayan Group, a leading power-broker in the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Afolayan
A member or relative of the Kojima family, owners and founders of Kojima Robotics, a leading power-broker in the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Kojima
A member or relative of the Nazari family, owners and founders of Nazari Industries, a leading power-broker in the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Nazari
A prominent military family in the Terran Confederation, with a record of loyal service stretching back generations.
Blood of Luo
The founder of Lebedev Interplanetary, Governor-General turned President of the Orion Reach, and leader of the Orion League against the Terran Confederation.
Blood of Juan Lebedev
King Arthur of Avalon claims to be cloned from the genetic material of the original Arthur Pendragon, ancient Terran hero and King of the Britons.
Blood of King Arthur
Son of the late Jionic President Hasegawa Yukio. Shiro's exploits as a pilot in the Jion Space Attack Force won him admiration and the moniker of 'Scarlet Devil'.
Blood of the Scarlet Devil

This character is a descendant of [This.Founder.GetCrisisFormalName], who gave the order to unleash weapons of mass destruction on Earth from orbit, murdering billions and consigning ten thousand years of human history to oblivion.
Legacy of Armageddon
This character is a descendant of [This.Founder.GetCrisisFormalName] "The Ideal", a living legend whose skill in battle was unmatched.
Blood of the Ideal
